name: VerseoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, ask Verse of the Day for today's bible verse”
”Alexa, ask Verse of the Day for today's devotional”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: verse of the day
des: This skill plays a daily devotional from VerseOfTheDay.com. Each devo includes a verse, thought, and prayer read by Phil Ware.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
